overview:
Richard Kang is the CEO & Co-Founder of Wipit, and a mobile industry executive with over 12 years of experience.

Previous to his current role as CEO and Co-founder of Wipit, Richard was an equity partner at VHA and Eureka Revenue Inc. (Eureka!), where he carried the roles of Vice President of Sales and General Manager. VHA and Eureka are national leaders in the distribution of prepaid telecom products and were previously the highest volume distributor for Boost Mobile. He has also held executive general management positions at several partners of AT&T Wireless, where he worked closely with the carrier in developing successful Master Agent and retail Premier Exclusive Agent distribution programs. Richard graduated from Cal Poly, Pomona and received his MBA from The USC Marshall School of Business in their Global Executive MBA Program.
